pageContext.display_address: St. Peter School, 96 Concord Ave, Cambridge, MA 02138
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Master your engineering skills with Play-Well TEKnologies and tens of thousands of LEGO® parts! Apply real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture through engineer-designed projects such as: Catapults, Bridges, and Battletracks! Design and build as never before and explore your craziest ideas.
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM Challenge with LEGO® Materials, Fall
pageContext.action_url_comment: To sign up for Afterschool, please complete the registration form found through the provided link so that they can hold a slot for your child.
